title: Tavarish (YouTuber, fixer of salvage supercars)
description:
Freddy "Tavarish" Hernandez (@therealtavarish) is one of the most popular automotive YouTubers. He's known for repairing broken exotic cars and giving them a second life. Most recently he's revived a crashed orange McLaren 675LT, documenting every step and mishap along the way. He's also the co-host of Car Trek along with Ed Bolian and Tyler Hoover.

 

Watch him here:  https://www.youtube.com/user/tavarish 

Let Sunday take the guesswork out of growing a greener, more beautiful lawn this Spring. Visit GETSUNDAY.COM/TIRE to get $20 off your custom lawn plan at checkout!

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
